metadata.Title: CVE-2020-6582 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description:
Nagios NRPE 3.2.1 has a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow, as demonstrated by interpretation of a small negative number as a large positive number during a bzero call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-6582` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nagios-nrpe-plugin - 4.0.0-2ubuntu1
nagios-nrpe-server - 4.0.0-2ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nagios-nrpe package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.0.0-2ubuntu1').
